## IMGUI.setMouse() method

Sets mouse position and current mouse button flags (i.e. `MouseEvent.buttons`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setMouse(p: Vec, buttons: number): this;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | <code>Vec</code> |  |
|  buttons | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
